issue.title: [C++][FlightRPC] Refactor error statuses/codes into the transport-agnostic layer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16069](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16069). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There's a list of "common" error codes we should handle: <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/format/Flight.html#error-handling>

We should also try to refactor common utilities out of the individual transports (at least as much as reasonably possible). We should also introduce a common test.
